title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, there is a discrepancy in the format displayed between the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
OB: The datetime values displayed in the dynamic text item and the data/text item are different. The dynamic text item shows the datetime in a different format compared to the data/text item.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed consistently in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item. They should have the same format.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item. 
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item. 
3. Observe the difference in the format of the datetime values between the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
